Title: yaTDL - yet another To-Do List
Description: yaTDL is a simple todo-list application written in C# that helps you manage your tasks.

Project Description

yaTDL is a simple todo-list application for Windows written in C#.

If you would like to participate in the project, your're welcome, there's plenty of work to do.
